name: Cosmic Maze
description:
(For best results, play in full screen by expanding the window in the bottom-right corner!)

As a beginner to Unity and game development, I decided to join a week-long game jam to challenge myself into creating my first game! 

Theme of game: Cosmic 

Limitation (a "rule" in which the game MUST follow): the player must cheat

The goal of this game is to collect all the items and escape the maze by getting through the obstacle at the end of the maze. I found this limitation to be extremely interesting and it really pushed me to come up with a way to incorporate it into my game. In the end, I made it so that the "invincibility potion" (which you receive if you collect all the items) made it possible to pass through not only the obstacle (as I wanted the player to believe that the potion was meant for the obstacle only), but also the entire maze (and therefore "cheating").
